is used to load the value of a local variable. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["refer-local", <variable_pos>, <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(define a 99)</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant 7
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [close 0
      [refer-local 0
         [return]]
      [apply]
      -1]]]]]
[halt]]</code></pre>
